name: Primal Might
description:
Fight for the ultimate form of survival in Primal Might!

*Made for Wowie Jam 3.0*

Controls: 

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Jump
  • X: Drop Item
  • Left Click: Interact
  • Hold Left/Right Click: Pan Camera
  • Scroll Mouse Wheel: Camera Zoom

Created by Carly Meyerhardt
